summary: Use the voice of Billy Mays to shout at your foes!
descriptionHtml:
I had this awesome idea, so I figured it needed to be made real.

Currently only two Shouts have been replaced. However, I plan on replacing all 20 shouts with different Billy Mays phrases!

It should work on any race, as long as they\'re male. I might put it onto female characters later, but for now they\'re on males. Make sure to tell me if it doesn\'t work, and tell me what race you were using!

INSTALLATION:
Go to 
(source drive)/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data and dump the sound file in there, overwrite anything in it.


Shouts replaced:
Fus Ro Dah (Unrelenting Force) with \"HI BILLY MAYS HERE!\"
Wuld Nah Kest (Whirlwind Sprint) with \"ARE YOU ON THE BALL?\"
author: RandomProduct
